com.appboy.models

Class InAppMessageControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appboy.models.InAppMessageBase
      • com.appboy.models.InAppMessageControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInAppMessage, IInAppMessageThemeable, IPutIntoJson<org.json.JSONObject>

    public class InAppMessageControl
extends InAppMessageBase
    If the user is enrolled in the control group of an in-app message campaign, an InAppMessageControl should be instantiated. InAppMessageControl instances can be serialized and used for analytics only. They should never be used to back an actual in-app message for display.

      • logImpression

        public boolean logImpression()
        Description copied from interface: IInAppMessage
        Logs an impression on this in-app message. Impressions may only be logged once per in-app message instance.

        See IInAppMessage.logClick()

        Specified by:
        logImpression in interface IInAppMessage
        Overrides:
        logImpression in class InAppMessageBase
        Returns:
        true iff the impression was successfully logged.
